column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It was my first time going to Jinya and my friends and I loved it! As soon as we walked in we were greeted and were given a table right away! Our server was named April and she was amazing! She took our drinks and brought them back fast
column2: and then took our order and was off to the kitchen! It seemed like it was only about 2 minutes after she left when she came back and asked if we needed anything; she was very kind and seemed to love her job! When our food came out it smelt so good and it tasted even better!! I loved the #1 and when I finished I wished I had more
column3: although I was stuffed!! I suggest everyone go because it had great service and great food! It was amazing and I will surely go back!! 6 out of 5 stars!!
